name: Taroverse
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Taroverse is a multi-game metaverse of play-to-earn games where players around the globe will be able to interact with one another in realtime through their 3d digital avatars using features like voice chat , emotes etc. Taroverse will be the first cross platform metaverse platform and will support  android , ios , windows and macOS.
